Definition: Given a comment text in English, classify the comment into one of these categories (i) Hope speech, (ii) Not Hope Speech or (iii) Not in Expected Language. A hope speech contains content that is encouraging, positive or supportive contents and talks about equality, diversity or inclusion

Positive Examples.input: you have encouraged me thank you for sharing
Positive Examples.explanation: The given text contains content that is encouraging, positive or supportive contents and talks about equality, diversity or inclusion and is in expected language

Positive Examples.input: There is justice for the natives the government literally pays us
Positive Examples.explanation: The given text does not contain content that is neither encouraging, positive and supportive contents nor talks about equality, diversity and inclusion although it is in expected language

Positive Examples.input: all lives matter .without that we never have peace so to me forever all lives matter.
Positive Examples.explanation: The given text contains content that is encouraging, positive or supportive contents and talks about equality, diversity or inclusion and is in expected language

Positive Examples.explanation: The given text is not in expected language

Negative Examples.input: Madonna looks like she has extra sensory abilities
Negative Examples.explanation: The given text does not contain content that is neither encouraging, positive and supportive contents nor talks about equality, diversity and inclusion although it is in expected language. So it is wrongly classified as Hope Speech

Negative Examples.input: 688 dislikes? HATERS WILL HATE! I feel bad for them though...
Negative Examples.explanation: The given text is in expected language but it is wrongly classified as Not in Expected Language

Negative Examples.input: OmG I love this talk. Debbie that was amazing. Lovely
